transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Ji sir, Namaste sir.
Executive: Namaste, kaun bol raha?
Customer: Sir, Sparshi baat kar rahi thi IndiaMART team se.
Executive: Haan, boliye.
Customer: Ji, ji, ji. Sir, actually services ke bare mein hi baat karni thi. Maine subah bhi connect kiya tha but aap shayad busy the.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Ji sir. Sir, leads vagaira use nahi kare. Sir, sari cheeze maine aapko matlab online pe describe ki thi. Kahan pe problem aa rahi hai sir abhi?
Customer: Madam aisa hai wo
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Paise wapas kara dijiye, hum nahi kar payenge hum aapke liye.
Executive: Sir, kya dikkat aa rahi hai sir?
Customer: Nahi ho payega madam, jaan rahe hain. Dikkat hi dikkat hai.
Executive: Sir, are sir dekho, aapne jaahir si baat hai business karne ke liye hi diya hoga hai na? To thoda sa agar aap bhi hume
Customer: Haan, wahi cheez hai sir. To hum bhi aapko support, aap bataiye agar mere end se kuch problem aa rahi hai kyunki main to aapko connect kar rahi hu aapko bhi pata hai.
Customer: Problem aap hi ke, aap, aap kaise bhi isliye ki humko mil nahi pata. Ek bhi lead hamari aaj tak hui hai?
Customer: Uh, sir lead to jo hai jab aap thoda
Customer: 50 kilo bechne nahi baithe hain na madam?
Executive: Nahi, wo to baat bilkul thik hai. Aapne Hindi aap deal bhi UP mein hi karenge pehle to, hai na? To mainly bulk order ka issue hai na sir?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To wo cheez bhi main aapko jo hai na lead share kar dungi. Maine kuch lead aapko share bhi ki thi shayad aapne unko connect bhi kiya hoga WhatsApp pe.
Customer: Nahi kiya tha, baatein nahi ho payi.
Executive: Achha, baat nahi ho payi. Koi baat nahi, main fir se aapko kuch leads jo hai na daily basis pe share karti hu.
Customer: Nahi madam aisa, hume paisa wapas kara dijiye bas.
Executive: Sir, ek baar use karke to dekhiye sir. Leads available bhi hai sab aur fir
Customer: Main nahi dekhunga, do mahina maine dekh liya usko. Aapke sab jhuthe hain, sab koi kaam karne wale nahi hain aapke aage bande.
Executive: Uh, sir unse jo jinhone aapko package diya tha unke liye unko to maine bola bhi tha aapse baat karne ke liye. Unhone shayad aapse baat ki to thi.
Customer: Kuch nahi, kuch nahi baat hui.
Executive: Kuch bhi baat nahi hui?
Customer: Na.
Executive: To sir, aap mujhe bataiye kahan pe kya hai to main aapko apne end se karungi sir. Sir kuch dikhana.
Customer: Nahi madam nahi ho payega. Nahi, nahi madam nahi ho payega na hum.
Executive: To dekho milke karenge to ho jayega sir. Ek baar try karke to dekhiye sir.
Customer: Nahi ho payega maine dekh liya IndiaMART mein kuch nahi ho sakta.
Executive: Sir abhi matlab aap bhi kaafi time se jo hai active nahi the. Wo cheez bhi hai na sir?
Customer: Nahi, nahi, main active thik hai yaar. Humko jo samjhaya gaya tha wo cheez kuch nahi hai.
Executive: Sir kya samjhaya gaya tha?
Customer: Madam please.
Executive: Nahi sir, main wo nahi keh rahi. Just to sir uske liye main baat karungi but ek baar aap mujhe puri baat to bataiye kya matlab kis tarike se aapko
Customer: Main abhi bahar hu actually mein. Main Allahabad mein nahi hu, bahar hu. Do din baad pahunchunga to fir main aapko bataunga wo detail.
Executive: Sir ji sir kya keh rahe hain?
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Main shadi mein aaya hu, do din bahar hu.
Executive: Hello. Haan. Sir kya keh rahe hain?
Customer: Main do din bahar hu, do din baad baat karunga aapse.
Executive: Achha, do din baad? To main aapko do din baad ek baar connect kar lu?
Customer: Haan, kar lijiyega magar koshish kariiyega ki mera paisa return ho jaye.
Executive: Thik hai sir.
Customer: Thik. Thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants refund for the subscription.

- Claims no leads received, feels cheated.

- States that the team is not working.

Resolution:

- Executive tried to convince to use services.

- Executive offered to share leads daily.

- Executive asked to explain the issue.

Next Steps: 

- Executive will call after two days.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, buyleads, subscription, active
